content: free pattern lavender s directions cast on 15 stitches with the long tail cast on bookmark knit 4 row 1 and all odd row k2 purl 11 k2 2 knit 4 k7 yo ssk knit to end of row 6 k5 k2tog yo k1 yo ssk k5 8 k4 k2tog yo k3 yo ssk k4 10 k3 k2tog yo k5 yo ssk k3 12 k2 k2tog yo k7 yo ssk k2 14 k3 yo ssk k2 yo ssk k1 k2tog yo k3 16 k4 yo s1 k2tog psso yo k1 yo s1 k2tog psso yo k4 18 knit 20 knit repeat row 4-21 once more 2x total then row 4-19 once for a total of 3 hearts work row 2-3 once more then work 4 row of garter stitch bind off and weave in ends glossary of abbreviations notes k = knit k2tog = knit two together p = purl blocking directions using blocking mat and ssk = slip slip knit 2 together p1k1 = purl 1 straight sewing pins or push pins stretch out knit one into one stitch sts = stitches slip 1 = the bookmark highlighting the pull of the slip one stitch knitwise fabric and straightening the sides dampen the piece with water in a spray bottle let dry materials for about an hour ● 20-30 yards fingering weight yarn ● 3 25mm us 3 straight needles ● blocking materials © 2020 elizabeth caneday feel free to make items from this pattern to sell or give away
